name: FOON
description:
You are a robot who escaped from robot factory and stole a gravity belt, lucky you! Now you must collect all the gears on the factory so no other robot is condemned to exist as a prisoner.

Made for the Game Makers Toolkit first game jam, it revolves around a rotation mechanic, the main character has the ability to manipulate gravity as he pleases and with it he can move around the map easily, dodge enemies and move crates so he can push them over his captors.

Even though he has a pretty decent movement speed and jump, he wouldn’t be able to escape if it wasn’t because the walls function also as floor and platforms for him.

Made for PC.

Controls:

Movement – arrow keys.

Right gravity rotation – “X” key.

Left gravity rotation – “Z” key.
